name: Reki Movie Recommendations
description: An add-on for the Reki platform that helps users track recommendations from friends and discuss shows they watch. The add-on leverages large language models to overcome the cold-start problem by recommending movies based on an initial user questionnaire.
role: Built an end-to-end recommendation solution using GPT-4 to generate dynamic filters for extracting movie data from TMDB
Applied NLP techniques to parse and normalize irregular LLM-generated outputs
Evaluated and experimented with Mistral and LLaMA models to reduce dependency on GPT-4 and lower operational costs
Implemented secure API key-based authentication for communication between the Reki application and the recommendation service
